00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <hdf.h>
00021 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00022 #include <string.h>
00023 
00040 MTKt_status MtkFileGridToNativeFieldList(
00041   const char *filename, 
00042   const char *gridname, 
00043   int *nfields, 
00044   char **fieldlist[]  )
00045 {
00046   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status of called functions */
00047   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status of this function. */
00048   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF-EOS return status */
00049   int32 Fid = FAIL;             /* HDF-EOS File ID */
00050 
00051   if (filename == NULL)
00052     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);  
00053 
00054   /* Open HDF file for reading */
00055   hdfstatus = Fid = GDopen((char*)filename,DFACC_READ);
00056   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00057     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00058 
00059   /* Read list of fields. */
00060   status = MtkFileGridToNativeFieldListFid(Fid, gridname, nfields, fieldlist);
00061   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00062 
00063   /* Close file. */
00064   hdfstatus = GDclose(Fid);
00065   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00066     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00067   Fid = FAIL;
00068 
00069   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00070 
00071  ERROR_HANDLE:
00072   if (Fid != FAIL) GDclose(Fid);
00073 
00074   return status_code;
00075 }
00076 
00082 MTKt_status MtkFileGridToNativeFieldListFid(
00083   int32 Fid,            
00084   const char *gridname, 
00085   int *nfields, 
00086   char **fieldlist[]  )
00087 {
00088   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status of this function. */
00089   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF-EOS return status */
00090   int32 Gid = FAIL;             /* HDF-EOS Grid ID */
00091   int32 num_fields = 0;         /* Number of fields */
00092   char *list = NULL;            /* List of fields */
00093   int i;
00094   char *temp = NULL;
00095   int32 str_buffer_size = 0;
00096 
00097   /* Check Arguments */
00098   if (fieldlist == NULL)
00099     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00100 
00101   *fieldlist = NULL; /* Set output to NULL to prevent freeing unallocated
00102                         memory in case of error. */
00103 
00104   if (gridname == NULL)
00105     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00106 
00107   if (nfields == NULL)
00108     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00109 
00110   /* Attach to grid */
00111   hdfstatus = Gid = GDattach(Fid,(char*)gridname);
00112   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00113     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDATTACH_FAILED);
00114 
00115   /* Query length of fields string */
00116   hdfstatus = GDnentries(Gid, HDFE_NENTDFLD, &str_buffer_size);
00117   if(hdfstatus == FAIL)
00118     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDNENTRIES_FAILED);
00119 
00120   list = (char*)malloc((str_buffer_size + 1)  * sizeof(char));
00121   if (list == NULL)
00122     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00123 
00124   /* Get list of fields */
00125   hdfstatus = num_fields = GDinqfields(Gid,list,NULL,NULL);
00126   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00127     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDINQFIELDS_FAILED);
00128 
00129   *nfields = num_fields;
00130   *fieldlist = (char**)calloc(num_fields,sizeof(char*));
00131   if (*fieldlist == NULL)
00132     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00133     
00134   temp = strtok(list,",");
00135   i = 0;
00136   while (temp != NULL)
00137   {
00138     (*fieldlist)[i] = (char*)malloc((strlen(temp) + 1) * sizeof(char));
00139     if ((*fieldlist)[i] == NULL)
00140       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00141     strcpy((*fieldlist)[i],temp);
00142     temp = strtok(NULL,",");
00143     ++i;
00144   }
00145 
00146   free(list);
00147 
00148   hdfstatus = GDdetach(Gid);
00149   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00150     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDDETACH_FAILED);
00151 
00152   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00153 
00154  ERROR_HANDLE:
00155   if (fieldlist != NULL)
00156     MtkStringListFree(num_fields, fieldlist);
00157 
00158   if (nfields != NULL)
00159     *nfields = -1;
00160 
00161   free(list);
00162   GDdetach(Gid);
00163 
00164   return status_code;
00165 }
